description: This fund was established by Dr. Patti Loughlin, Professor of History, to benefit students pursuing the MA in History or the BA in History at the University of Central Oklahoma. Eligibility Requirements Complete application Must be in either the MA in History program or the BA in History program This scholarship is available to apply for during the current UCO student application period.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
